title: I’m Living as a Healer in Nord World - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Female to Male   Game Ranking System   Heartwarming   Modern Day   Virtual Reality
author: 은차우
description:
Nord World, a game that is being ruined by the production company’s neglect.

One day, an event notice suddenly appeared.

[Pre-Booking for the Winter Monster Invasion Event]]
[If you accept, go to the waiting room. If you refuse, you’ll be logged out immediately.]
[Will you make a reservation in advance reservation?]
[Yes | No]

All players who pressed Yes for the event are now trapped in the game.>
